author: the_deuce
post: And don’t forget that Stephen Jones is a “a boil on the bum of the blogosphere,” LOL. Honestly, I’ve sort of come to appreciate Colin’s writings as bombastic self parody, but I can see why people trying to have a serious conversation would be less amused by it..
title: Regrettably
